name: jq
description: Parse, filter, and transform JSON data using jq expressions. Reads JSON from standard input and applies a jq filter expression to extract fields, map arrays, compute values, or reshape the structure. Supports dot notation (.field), array indexing (.[0]), pipes (|), built-in functions (length, keys, select, map, sort_by), and object construction. Use for extracting values from API responses, transforming JSON documents, or querying structured data.

input.description: JSON data on standard input. The first argument is the jq filter expression (e.g., '.items[] | .name').

output.description: The result of applying the jq filter to the input. Output format depends on the filter â€” may be a single value, array, or object.
